title: Macro Indicators Parquet Schema
description: Time series data for macroeconomic indicators from RBI, MOSPI, and other sources

indicator_date.description: Date of the indicator observation (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD)

indicator_code.description: Unique code identifying the indicator (e.g., REPO_RATE, CPI_COMBINED, WPI_ALL, FX_RESERVES)

indicator_category.description: Category of indicator (POLICY_RATE, INFLATION, FX_RESERVE, GDP, EMPLOYMENT)

unit.description: Unit of measurement (%, INR Crore, USD Million, Index Points, etc.)

frequency.description: Frequency of data (DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, ANNUAL)

ingestion_timestamp.description: Timestamp when data was ingested (ISO 8601 format)
